body_html: Yeah this makes it more consistent. Also, I don't see any reason for this to use more memory than the old implementation. The way indices are being stored is changed, but we're still using the same number of bits in the tensor.
body_text: Yeah this makes it more consistent. Also, I don't see any reason for this to use more memory than the old implementation. The way indices are being stored is changed, but we're still using the same number of bits in the tensor.
body: Yeah this makes it more consistent. Also, I don't see any reason for this to use more memory than the old implementation. The way indices are being stored is changed, but we're still using the same number of bits in the tensor.
